Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First I need to look at each case and see which activities are repeated Let me start with Case C001 The first activity is Initiate Request at 0915 Then Verify Documents at 0920 then Call Customer at 0945 Then Submit Additional at 1010 Verify Documents again at 1030 and finally Approve Request at 1045

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So the Verify Documents activity happens twice The first time its after the initial request and before the customer uploads documents The second time after the upload the agent re-verifies So the first Verify Documents is part of the initial verification while the second is a followup

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Therefore maybe I should rename them to something like Initial Document Verification and Followup Document Verification to indicate the context

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Next looking at Case C002 The first Initiate Request is straightforward Then Verify Documents again then Call Customer outbound call then Adjust Account internal adjustment then another Call Customer followup and Approve Request The first Verify Documents is identity verification the second Verify Documents after the account adjustment So maybe Initial Document Verification and PostAdjustment Document Verification

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For Case C003 the Verify Documents is done twice The first is after the initial request then after the account adjustment So similar to the others maybe Initial Document Verification and PostAdjustment Document Verification

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Now for the renaming I need to make sure the names clearly show the context For example Call Customer in C001 is a call to request missing documents whereas in C002 its an outbound call to clarify an account discrepancy So the first call is a proactive call the second is a followup So perhaps Proactive Call to Request Missing Documents and Followup Call to Clarify Account Discrepancy

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Similarly in C003 the first Call Customer is when the customer was out so the officer called them back Thats a Followup Call to Retrieve Customer Information

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Then the Adjust Account activity in C002 and C003 The first Adjust Account is an internal correction due to missing info and the second is a postadjustment verification So maybe Internal Account Adjustment and PostAdjustment Account Verification

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I need to check if all the activities that are repeated have different contexts Let me go through each case again C001 Verify Documents twice First is initial second is after upload So two different contexts C002 Verify Documents once then after account adjustment So two contexts C003 Verify Documents twice first after initial request second after adjustment So two contexts Other activities Call Customer in C001 is a call to request missing docs in C002 is a call to clarify discrepancy and in C003 is a followup call to retrieve info So three different contexts

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: So for each of these I need to rename them based on the context Now for the renaming I should use terms that indicate the context For example Initial Document Verification for the first time Followup Document Verification for the second Similarly for the calls

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Let me structure the renamed activities Case C001  Initiate Request  Initial Document Verification  Proactive Call to Request Missing Documents  Submit Additional since its the customer uploading the ID  Followup Document Verification  Final Approval Case C002  Initiate Request  Initial Document Verification  Outbound Call to Clarify Account Discrepancy  Internal Account Adjustment  Followup Call to Confirm Adjustments  Final Approval Case C003  Initiate Request  Initial Document Verification  Followup Call to Retrieve Customer Information  Internal Account Adjustment  PostAdjustment Document Verification  Final Approval

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I need to make sure that the names are clear and reflect the context Also check for any other activities that might need renaming For example Call Customer in C001 is a call to request missing docs which is a proactive action In C002 its a call to clarify a discrepancy In C003 its a followup call to retrieve info So each of these has different purposes

Name: Deductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Another thing to note Adjust Account in C002 and C003 The first is an internal correction due to missing info the second is a postadjustment verification So Internal Account Adjustment and PostAdjustment Account Verification

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I think thats all Now I need to present the revised log with these renamed activities Also justify the naming choices based on the context For example Proactive Call to Request Missing Documents because its a call made when the customer didnt provide the documents initially Followup Call to Clarify Account Discrepancy because its a call to address an issue found during the account adjustment Followup Call to Retrieve Customer Information because its a call made when the customer was out of the office Internal Account Adjustment because its an internal process and PostAdjustment Account Verification because its after the adjustment was made
